title: Residential and Compatible development adjacent to Gaothan in Rural area : Residential and / or Compatible development shall be allowed within 200 m
clause_text: Residential and Compatible development adjacent to Gaothan in Rural area : Residential and / or Compatible development shall be allowed within 200 m. from Periphery of the Gaothan Boundary with following conditions -
